an5.235:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu gihinam anukampati.
an5.235:1.7: maha kho pana bhikkhusangho abhikkanto nanaverajjaka bhikkhu gihinam upasankamitva aroceti:
an5.235:1.8: ‘maha kho, avuso, bhikkhusangho abhikkanto nanaverajjaka bhikkhu, karotha punnani, samayo punnani katun’ti;
an5.235:1.9: yam kho panassa bhojanam denti lukham va panitam va tam attana paribhunjati, saddhadeyyam na vinipateti.
an5.235:1.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu gihinam anukampati”ti.
